Enumeration Type Documentation

enum protocol_bus_type
Enumerator:
BUS_UNSUPPORTED 
BUS_EEPROM 
BUS_I2C 
BUS_RAW_REG 

V5P memory-mapped peripherals.

BUS_RDMA 

Downstream configuration.

BUS_SPI 

SPI bus.

BUS_DIRECT 

Direct memory write.

BUS_FAN_CONT 

Access to the fan control internal memory.

BUS_FEM_CONFIG 

Access to the FEM Config.

enum protocol_commands
